name: Dicey-Sokoban
description:
Controls:
Movement:               WASD
Restart:                      R
Start/Next Level:      Space
In the lower left corner you will see the different values of the dice depending on which way you move next

Goal:
Roll the dice to the spot on the floor with a dot. 

Made in 48 hours for the Game Maker Tool Kit Game Jam!

Theme: Roll of the Dice.

Credits:
Code: NickTheSic
Art: Kenney
Font: Caviar Dreams Font by Lauren Thompson

Download the windows build and create your own puzzles with a very quick and dirty level editor that not even I enjoy using! (If I ended up uploading)

Press 'T' to switch to and from edit mode.
While in edit mode press 'J' 'K' 'N' 'M' to change the size of the grid.
Left/Right click moves through the different tiles
One player start and One exit per level
